Field.Label: Welcome and thank you for using Smart Devices! Most configuration is done in the Smart Devices you create and are related to that specific Smart Device. Default values are based on degrees Celsius. If you are using Fahrenheit, please update your values accordingly.
For safety reasons the Simple Smart Thermostat will not allow you to select extreme setpoint values. Configure the maximum and minimum allowed setpoint values here:
Some sensors, especially in battery operated devices, may fail to send up to date values or sometimes out of bounds values. Invalid values will be displayed as -999 and ignored.
Note that if you use variables to collect sensor data: Older Then check is not possible and will be ignored.
Email sending must be configured in Indigo's preferences.
If you are having problems, wants to closely monitor Smart Devices or you are instructed by support, you can enable extra logging in the Event Log window by checking the button below.
Debugging will use resource's and clog up your Event Log window. This is not recommended if you don't need it.
